explanations.neural network: The paper mentions the use of Back Propagation Fuzzy Neural Network (BPFNN) in constructing a supply chain management model.
explanations.backpropagation: The paper specifically refers to Back Propagation (BP) in the context of the neural network used in the model.
explanations.BP: BP is an abbreviation for Back Propagation, which is explicitly mentioned in the paper as part of the BPFNN model.
